FuncDef: The display igmp-snooping statistics vsi command displays message statistics of a specified VSI.
CLIs: display igmp-snooping statistics vsi <vsi-name> listening interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about IGMP snooping running in a specified VSI.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays message statistics of a QinQ sub-interface with the specified sub-interface type and number.
-

Specifies the interface that is listened to.
-

Displays message statistics of a interface with the specified interface type and number.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display igmp-snooping statistics vsi vsi-a listening interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/1.1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To query message statistics of a specified QinQ sub-interface that is listened to, run the display igmp-snooping statistics listening interface command.
